c74object.name: pesto~
c74object.digest: A wrapper to run streaming inference on PESTO pitch estimation models
c74object.description: A wrapper to run streaming inference on PESTO pitch estimation models.

objarg.name: init_chunk
objarg.description: Model chunk size (in samples). Specifying a size will load a matching model from pesto/models. Use 0 to load the fastest available model.

method.name: freq
method.digest: Test model with a single chunk of sine wave input at specified frequency (Hz)
method.description: Test model with a single chunk of sine wave input at specified frequency (Hz). Usage: 'freq 440'

method.name: test
method.digest: Run model inference on random test data and report the inference latency
method.description: Run model inference on random test data and report the inference latency

method.name: bang
method.digest: Force immediate model inference with current audio data, then clear buffers
method.description: Force immediate model inference with current audio data, then clear buffers

method.name: chunk
method.digest: Load a model based on chunk size (e.g., 'chunk 512')
method.description: Load a model based on chunk size (e.g., 'chunk 512'). Searches for and loads a model matching the specified chunk size from pesto/models. Can be used to change models at runtime.

method.name: model
method.digest: Load a specific model by filename (e.g., 'model 20251502_sr44k_h512.pt')
method.description: Load a specific model by filename (e.g., 'model 20251502_sr44k_h512.pt'). Searches for and loads a model matching the specified name from pesto/models. Can be used to change models at runtime.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset the object by clearing both audio and model internal buffers
method.description: Reset the object by clearing both audio and model internal buffers

attribute.name: amp
attribute.description: Amplitude threshold (0+). When set, pitch output will be -1500 if amplitude is below threshold

attribute.name: conf
attribute.description: Confidence threshold (0-1). When set, pitch output will be -1500 if confidence is below threshold
